text: Judgment and Salvation
“I let myself be sought by \add those who\add* did not ask;
I let myself be found by \add those who\add* did not seek me.
I said, ‘Here I am; here I am!’ to a nation \add that\add* did not call on my name;
I spread out my hands all day to a stubborn people,
those who walk after their thoughts \add in\add* the way \add that is\add* not good,
the people ⸤who provoke⸥\f + \fr 65:3 \ft Literally “provoking” \f* me to anger continually to my face,
slaughtering for sacrifices in the garden,
and making smoke offerings on bricks,
⸤who sit⸥\f + \fr 65:4 \ft Literally “sitting” \f* in graves
and spend the night in ⸤secret places⸥,\f + \fr 65:4 \ft Literally “watches” \f*
⸤who eat⸥\f + \fr 65:4 \ft Literally “eating” \f* the flesh of swine
with\f + \fr 65:4 \ft Or “and” \f* a fragment\f + \fr 65:4 \ft The reading tradition (\fqa Qere \ft ) has “broth” \f* of impurity \add in\add* their vessels,
⸤who say⸥,\f + \fr 65:5 \ft Literally “saying” \f* “⸤Keep to yourself⸥!\f + \fr 65:5 \ft Literally “Come near to you” \f*
You must not come near me, for I am \add too\add* holy for you!”
These \add are\add* a smoke in my ⸤nostrils⸥,\f + \fr 65:5 \ft Literally “nose” \f*
a fire burning all day.
Look! \add It\add* is written before me: I will not be silent, but I will repay;
and I will repay in\f + \fr 65:6 \ft Or “on” \f* the fold of their garment
your iniquities and the iniquities of your ancestors\f + \fr 65:7 \ft Or “fathers” \f* together, says Yahweh,
because they made smoke offerings on the mountains
and they taunted me on the hills,
I will measure their punishment \add from the\add* beginning into the fold of their garment.”

Thus says Yahweh: “Just as the new wine is found in the cluster, and they say ‘You must not destroy it, for \add there is\add* a blessing in it,’ so I will do for the sake of my servants ⸤by⸥\f + \fr 65:8 \ft Literally “to” \f* not destroying ⸤everyone⸥.\f + \fr 65:8 \ft Literally “all” \f*
And I will bring descendant s\f + \fr 65:9 \ft Hebrew “descendant” \f* out from Jacob,
and a ⸤people⸥\f + \fr 65:9 \ft Literally “man” \f* from Judah to take possession of my mountain,
and my chosen ones shall inherit it,
and my servants shall settle there.
And Sharon shall become a pasture for\f + \fr 65:10 \ft Literally “of” \f* flocks,\f + \fr 65:10 \ft Hebrew “flock” \f*
and the valley of Achor a resting place for\f + \fr 65:10 \ft Or “of” \f* herds\f + \fr 65:10 \ft Hebrew “herd” \f*
for my people who have sought me.
But\f + \fr 65:11 \ft Or “and” \f* you ⸤who forsake⸥\f + \fr 65:11 \ft Literally “forsaking” \f* Yahweh,
forgetting ⸤my holy mountain⸥,\f + \fr 65:11 \ft Literally “the mountain of my holiness” \f*
who set a table for Fortune,
and who ⸤pour out⸥\f + \fr 65:11 \ft Literally “fill” \f* a jug of mixed wine for Destiny,
and I will remit you to the sword,
and all of you shall bow down to the slaughter,
because I called, but\f + \fr 65:12 \ft Or “and” \f* you did not answer;
I spoke, but\f + \fr 65:12 \ft Or “and” \f* you did not listen,
but\f + \fr 65:12 \ft Or “and” \f* you did the evil in my eyes,
and you chose that in which I do not delight.”
Therefore thus says the Lord Yahweh:
“Look! My servants shall eat but\f + \fr 65:13 \ft Or “and” \f* you, you shall be hungry.
Look! My servants shall drink but\f + \fr 65:13 \ft Or “and” \f* you, you shall be thirsty.
Look! My servants shall rejoice but\f + \fr 65:13 \ft Or “and” \f* you, you shall be ashamed.

Look! My servants shall shout ⸤for joy⸥,\f + \fr 65:14 \ft Literally “from goodness of heart” \f* but\f + \fr 65:14 \ft Or “and” \f* you, you shall cry out ⸤for pain⸥\f + \fr 65:14 \ft Literally “from pain of heart” \f* and howl ⸤for sadness⸥.\f + \fr 65:14 \ft Literally “from a breaking of \fq the \ft spirit” \f*
And you shall leave your name to my chosen ones as a curse,
and the Lord Yahweh will kill you, and he will ⸤give⸥\f + \fr 65:15 \ft Literally “call” \f* his servants another name.
Whoever blesses himself in the land shall bless himself by the God of trustworthiness,
and the one who swears an oath in the land shall swear by the God of trustworthiness,
because the former troubles are forgotten,
and they are hidden from my eyes.
New Creation
For look! I \add am\add* about to create new heavens and a new earth,
and the former things shall not be remembered,
and they shall not ⸤come to mind⸥.\f + \fr 65:17 \ft Literally “go up to heart” \f*
But rejoice and shout in exultation forever and ever \add over\add* what I \add am\add* about to create!
For look! I \add am\add* about to create Jerusalem \add as a source of\add* rejoicing,
and her people \add as a source of\add* joy.
And I will shout in exultation over Jerusalem,
and I will rejoice over my people,
and \add the\add* sound of weeping shall no longer be heard in it,
or\f + \fr 65:19 \ft Or “and” \f* \add the\add* sound of a cry for help.
There will no longer be a nursing infant ⸤who lives only a few⸥\f + \fr 65:20 \ft Literally “of” \f* days,
or\f + \fr 65:20 \ft Or “and” \f* an old man who does not fill his days,
for the boy will die ⸤a hundred years old⸥,\f + \fr 65:20 \ft Literally “a son of a hundred year” \f*

and the one who ⸤fails to reach⸥\f + \fr 65:20 \ft Literally “misses” \f* ⸤a hundred years⸥\f + \fr 65:20 \ft Literally “a son of a hundred year” \f* will be ⸤considered⸥\f + \fr 65:20 \ft Literally “treated” \f* accursed.
And they shall build houses and inhabit \add them\add*,
and they shall plant vineyards and eat their fruit.
They shall not build and another inhabit;
they shall not plant and another eat.
For the days of my people \add shall be\add* like the days of \add a\add* tree,
and my chosen ones shall enjoy the work of their hands.
They shall not labor for nothing,
and they shall not give birth to horror,
for they ⸤shall be offspring blessed by⸥\f + \fr 65:23 \ft Literally “the offspring of the blessing of” \f* Yahweh,
and their descendants with them.
And this will happen: before they call, I myself will answer;
\add while\add* still they \add are\add* speaking, I myself will hear.
\add The\add* wolf and \add the\add* lamb shall feed like one,
and \add the\add* lion shall eat straw like the ox,
but\f + \fr 65:25 \ft Or “and” \f* dust \add shall be\add* \add the\add* serpent’s food.
They shall do no evil,
and they shall not destroy on all ⸤my holy mountain⸥,”\f + \fr 65:25 \ft Literally “the mountain of my holiness” \f* says Yahweh.
